medicines.name: Paracetamol
medicines.description: Paracetamol (acetaminophen) is a pain reliever and fever reducer. It is used to treat many conditions such as headache, muscle aches, arthritis, backache, toothaches, colds, and fevers.
medicines.dosage: 500-1000mg every 4-6 hours as needed. Maximum 4000mg daily.

medicines.name: Ibuprofen
medicines.description: Ibuprofen is a nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID). It works by reducing hormones that cause inflammation and pain in the body. Used for fever, pain, and inflammation.
medicines.dosage: 200-400mg every 4-6 hours as needed. Maximum 1200mg daily.

medicines.name: Amoxicillin
medicines.description: Amoxicillin is an antibiotic used to treat a variety of bacterial infections. It works by stopping the growth of bacteria. This antibiotic treats only bacterial infections.
medicines.dosage: 250-500mg three times daily, or as prescribed.

medicines.name: Cetirizine
medicines.description: Cetirizine is an antihistamine that reduces the effects of natural chemical histamine in the body. Histamine can produce symptoms of sneezing, itching, watery eyes, and runny nose.

medicines.name: Omeprazole
medicines.description: Omeprazole decreases the amount of acid produced in the stomach. Used to treat symptoms of gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD) and other conditions caused by excess stomach acid.
medicines.dosage: 20mg once daily before a meal, preferably in the morning.

medicines.name: Aspirin
medicines.description: Aspirin (acetylsalicylic acid) is a salicylate that reduces substances in the body that cause pain, fever, and inflammation. It can also prevent blood clots, reducing risk of heart attacks and strokes.
medicines.dosage: 325-650mg every 4 hours as needed for pain. 75-325mg daily for heart health.

medicines.name: Loratadine
medicines.description: Loratadine is an antihistamine that reduces the effects of natural chemical histamine in the body. It treats symptoms such as sneezing, runny nose, and watery eyes. Non-drowsy formula.

medicines.name: Metformin
medicines.description: Metformin is an oral diabetes medicine that helps control blood sugar levels. It is used together with diet and exercise to improve blood sugar control in adults with type 2 diabetes.
medicines.dosage: 500-1000mg twice daily with meals, or as prescribed.

medicines.name: Atorvastatin
medicines.description: Atorvastatin is in a group of drugs called HMG CoA reductase inhibitors, or statins. It reduces levels of bad cholesterol (LDL) and triglycerides in the blood, while increasing good cholesterol (HDL).

medicines.name: Vitamin D3
medicines.description: Vitamin D3 (cholecalciferol) is vitamin D, which is important for the absorption of calcium from the stomach and for the functioning of calcium in the body. Helps maintain strong bones.

medicines.name: Diazepam
medicines.description: Diazepam belongs to a group of drugs called benzodiazepines. It affects chemicals in the brain that may be unbalanced in people with anxiety. Used to treat anxiety, alcohol withdrawal, muscle spasms, and seizures.

medicines.name: Salbutamol Inhaler
medicines.description: Salbutamol (albuterol) is a bronchodilator that relaxes muscles in the airways and increases air flow to the lungs. Used to treat bronchospasm in patients with asthma, bronchitis, and COPD.

medicines.name: Multivitamin
medicines.description: A complete multivitamin supplement that provides essential vitamins and minerals to support overall health and wellbeing. Helps fill nutritional gaps in your diet.

medicines.name: Antacid Tablets
medicines.description: Antacid tablets neutralize stomach acid to relieve heartburn, acid indigestion, and upset stomach. Fast-acting formula provides quick relief of acid reflux symptoms.
medicines.dosage: 1-2 tablets as needed, up to 4 times daily.

medicines.name: Hydrocortisone Cream
medicines.description: Hydrocortisone cream is a mild corticosteroid that reduces the actions of chemicals in the body that cause inflammation, redness, and swelling. Used for skin irritation, allergic reactions, and minor rashes.
medicines.dosage: Apply a thin layer to affected area 1-4 times daily.

medicines.name: Acetylcysteine
medicines.description: Acetylcysteine is a mucolytic agent that breaks down mucus, helping to clear airways and making breathing easier. Used for respiratory conditions with thick mucus production.
medicines.dosage: 600mg once daily or as directed by physician.
